org.waag.histograph.es

Class ESMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waag.histograph.es.ESMethods

  • public class ESMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing several static methods for basic Elasticsearch operations. All methods require an added JestClient object that handles the ES connection.
    Author:
    Rutger van Willigen, Bert Spaan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ESMethods()

      Method to add a PIT to the Elasticsearch index.
      static void createIndex(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client, Configuration config)
      Method that creates a new PIT index.

      Method to delete a PIT from the Elasticsearch index.
      static boolean indexExists(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client, Configuration config)
      Method that checks whether the Histograph index exists.

    • Method Detail

      • testConnection

        public static void testConnection(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                                  Configuration config)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that tests the ES client's connection. An exception is thrown if the connection fails.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object that handles the ES connection.
        config - Configuration object containing the configuration of the JestClient object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when the connection fails.

      • createIndex

        public static void createIndex(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                               Configuration config)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that creates a new PIT index. The mapping file location should be defined in the Configuration object.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object that handles the ES connection.
        config - Configuration object containing the configuration of the JestClient object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if index creation fails.

      • indexExists

        public static boolean indexExists(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                                  Configuration config)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that checks whether the Histograph index exists. Index and type should be specified in the Configuration object.
        Parameters:
        client - The JestClient object containing the Elasticsearch connection
        config - The Configuration object in which the Elasticsearch index and type are defined
        Returns:
        A boolean value expressing whether the index exists or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown when an unexpected reponse is given by the JestClient

      • addPIT

        public static org.json.JSONObject addPIT(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                         Configuration config)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to add a PIT to the Elasticsearch index.
        Parameters:
        client - The JestClient object containing the Elasticsearch connection
        params - A map containing the parameters of the PIT that is to be added
        config - A Configuration object in which the Elasticsearch index and type are defined
        Returns:
        A JSONObject containing the JestClient's response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Propagated exception from the JestClient.execute(io.searchbox.action.Action) method.

      • updatePIT

        public static org.json.JSONObject updatePIT(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                            Configuration config)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to update a PIT in the Elasticsearch index. This is composed of a removal of the old PIT and an addition of the PIT present in the parameters.
        Parameters:
        client - The JestClient object containing the Elasticsearch connection
        params - A map containing the parameters of the PIT that is to be added
        config - A Configuration object in which the Elasticsearch index and type are defined
        Returns:
        A JSONObject containing the JestClient's response for both the delete and add operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Propagated exception from the JestClient.execute(io.searchbox.action.Action) methods.

      • deletePIT

        public static org.json.JSONObject deletePIT(io.searchbox.client.JestClient client,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                            Configuration config)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to delete a PIT from the Elasticsearch index.
        Parameters:
        client - The JestClient object containing the Elasticsearch connection
        params - A map containing the parameters of the PIT that is to be removed
        config - A Configuration object in which the Elasticsearch index and type are defined
        Returns:
        A JSONObject containing the JestClient's response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Propagated exception from the JestClient.execute(io.searchbox.action.Action) method.
